snippet: In his first major speech since returning to the presidency, Vladimir V. Putin urged Russians “not to lose ourselves as a nation” as it charts its post-Soviet development.
abstract: Pres Vladimir V Putin urges Russians to look for guidance in Russia's historic and traditional values, and not in Western political models, in his first major speech since returning to presidency; Putin also warns government officials that their spending will be monitored and that prosecutor's office had been empowered to seize illegally acquired assets.
lead_paragraph: In his first major speech since returning to the presidency, Vladimir V. Putin urged Russians “not to lose ourselves as a nation” as it charts its post-Soviet development.

headline.main: Russia’s History Should Guide Its Future, Putin Says
headline.print_headline: Russia’s History Should Guide Its Future, Putin Says
